What are the most common ways to treat dry scalp and care for dandruff?
You can treat a dry scalp and take care of dandruff with products containing at least one of the following types of active ingredients:

Anti fungal ingredients reduce the amount of fungus on the scalp therefore fighting the leading cause of dandruff. These ingredients include Zinc Pyrithione (ZPT) and selenium sulfide.

Anti-proliferative agents slow down the production of skin cells without necessarily acting directly against the fungus. One such ingredient is coal tar which primarily fights signs of dandruff.

Keratolytic agents break down the intercellular bond (keratin) that holds skin cells together on the uppermost layer of the scalp. Therefore when the top layer of cells are shed they are separate rather than in clumps. These agents include sulfur and salicylic acid which again primarily fights signs and not the cause of dandruff.
